body_html:
@lirchi @skye
Were you able to load the graph and run the session in c++?
Once you serialize a tensorflow::Example as a string, how do you pass it to session->Run(..)
I can't find any documentation on this, or any answered stack overflow posts.

I've posted on stack overflow as well:
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44790456/how-to-feed-inputs-into-a-loaded-tensorflow-model-using-c
https://stackoverflow.com/questions/44848733/how-to-convert-a-serialized-tensorflowexample-into-a-single-tensor

@lirchi @skye 
Were you able to load the graph and run the session in c++? 
Once you serialize a tensorflow::Example as a string, how do you pass it to session->Run(..)
I can't find any documentation on this, or any answered stack overflow posts.

I've posted on stack overflow as well:
